unnormalised: Hey guys, any updates on Dhawan's injury? Heard he tweaked his hamstring during the Ranji Trophy match in Nagpur. Hope it's not too serious, we need him fit for the upcoming series. Doctors at AIIMS Delhi are top-notch, hopefully, they can work their magic. Recover soon, paaji! Like, "Kal Ho Naa Ho" – we need you on the field, not in a hospital bed! Get well soon!
normalised: Hey guys, any updates on Dhawan's injury? Heard he tweaked his hamstring during the Ranji Trophy match in Nagpur. Hope it's not too serious, we need him fit for the upcoming series. Doctors at A I I M S Delhi are top-notch, hopefully, they can work their magic. Recover soon, paaji! Like, "Kal Ho Naa Ho" – we need you on the field, not in a hospital bed! Get well soon!
